title: IBM Cloud overview docs
introduction: The platform is built to support your needs whether it's working only in the public cloud or taking advantage of a multicloud deployment model. Leverage the docs, API & SDK reference, architecture references, and more to support your app development needs.

section_recommended.title: What's included in the platform?
section_recommended.description: The platform consists of a network of interrelated components that work together to provide a consistent and dependable cloud experience to support your app development needs.

section_recommended.title: Try out IBM Cloud, for free
section_recommended.description: Get up and running quickly by setting up an account and exploring free products with this short tutorial.

section_recommended.title: Service and infrastructure by location
section_recommended.description: Check out the regions and data centers that IBM Cloud products are available.

section_videos.title: Learn how to navigate through the IBM Cloud console

tiles.title: A new way to provide IBM Cloud your feedback
tiles.description: We want to hear from you! Let us know about your experience with the IBM Cloud console by submitting your feedback from the Help > Send feedback option in the console menu bar. You can tell us what you love and even what youâ€™d like to see improved, so we can work together to ensure that you always enjoy developing on IBM Cloud.

tiles.title: Getting help in the console
tiles.description: You can now find the documentation and Support Center help options from a single menu item in the IBM Cloud console menu bar. Check out the new Help option from the menu bar that now includes your links for Docs, the Support Center, and available guided tours.

tiles.title: Attaching tags on service IDs
tiles.description: In addition to tagging resources, you can now attach user tags and access management tags on service IDs. User tags help you group service IDs for usage reports, and you can use access management tags to control access to your service IDs.
